head.title: Combine {{EXT}} Files in {{ProgLang}} | {{EXT}} Merger
head.description: Combine multiple {{EXT}} files into a single file using {{ProgLang}} {{ProductName}} documents merger API. Combine specific pages or page ranges from various documents to a single document.

header.title: Combine {{EXT}} Files In {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Combine {{EXT}} with a few lines of {{ProductName}} code.

about.title: About {{ProductFullName}} API
about.h1: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{slash_lang}}/merger/{{ProductCode}}/) provides a convenient solution to combine multiple Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF, Visio and other documents into a single file within {{ProductName}} applications. GroupDocs.Merger will save you a lot of effort, as you are allowed to combine word documents - there is no need to install any third-party software, desktop applications or plugins. Now it is unnecessary to waste your time and combine files manually! GroupDocs mission is to provide the best quality and simplify document-processing workflows.
about.h2: GroupDocs.Merger APIs are well supported on all major operating systems and platforms including {{Runtime}}.

content_left.description: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{slash_lang}}/merger/{{ProductCode}}/) makes it easy for {{ProductName}} developers to combine two or more {{EXT}} files within their applications by implementing a few easy steps.
content_left.step_1: Create new instance of **Merger** and pass source document path as a constructor parameter.
content_left.step_2: Call **Join** of **Merger** class and pass the second source document path.
content_left.step_3: Call **Save** of **Merger** class to save the merged document.

content_right.description: {{ProductFullName}} APIs are supported on all major platforms and operating systems. Before executing the code below, please make sure that you have the following prerequisites installed on your system.
content_right.step_1: Operating Systems: Microsoft Windows, Linux, MacOS
content_right.step_4: Download the latest version of {{ProductFullName}} from [{{RepoName}}]({{RepoUrl}})

steps.title_code: How to combine {{EXT}} files using {{ProgLang}} example code

code.run_comment: Call Join method of Merger class instance and pass second source document path
code.save_comment: Call Save method of Merger class instance to save merged document

more_formats.title: Merging Other Document Formats
more_formats.content: {{ProductName}} documents merger API for file formats and images. Combine together some of the popular document formats as stated below.
